text: Leon Christoph Goretzka (born 6 February 1995) is a German professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Bayern Munich and the Germany national team. ==Club statistics== Club Season League Cup Continental Total League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bochum 2012–13 2.
